text: Here's an idea. Let's all send letters of protest to the White House. If you have an issue with the President, I don't care if you are from the United States or not, send a letter & say so. Let's fill the place up with snail mail: 1600 Pennsylvania Ave NW, Washington DC, 20500.
I never thought I'd see the day when a president of the United States could not spell a four letter word. This assclown ought to be in middle school, not the White House.

Obama sent a congratulations letter to these Rosicrucian knuckleheads as President of the United States , search for the Obama White House on Facebook, still listed as his @ WhiteHouse https://twitter.com/realWilliamDunn/status/1016177862557089793 …

Am sure the office is sending a letter to the White House asking the president to help him get his job back. He was just doing what the president of united states authorise him to do.

@ whitehouse @ RoyalFamily The United States of America has a message in its name that says “There is no mathematical solution..” my name says “No Espionage”, so it appears President Harry Truman created a mathematical solution.. Just add the first number of each letter.. pic.twitter.com/BSmN4iPXPZ

Kim Jong un delivered Trump pee pee tape photos in that very large envelope. What is the other plausible answer for the Norh Korean Intelligence Chief to deliver an oversized “letter” to the Oval Office in the White House to the President of the United States? Damn it, be honest!

Kim Jong Un had a letter (carrot) hand carried to the President of the United States. The President did not read the letter. What will happen when Kim employs the stick. Your guess is as good as mine.

Here is the error filled letter Trump sent, with corrections. Retired teacher have him a grade of D. This was from The President of The United States! Not only embarrassing but shows the horrendous mismanagement of The Trump White House! pic.twitter.com/SfVqA98lLU

A tweet is in no way compared to a professional letter from the President of the United States. This isn’t a casual letter to rekindle a relationship. You’re just as incompetent as those clowns in the White House. “The thought that counts” As I said before, raise hour standards.

The letter should not have gone out with so many errors. Regardless of the proper or improper capitalization of the word nation, the White House should write a proper letter, especially if the President of the United States is putting his name in it.
And the @ WhiteHouse should have 'Others' that have a grasp on the English language. What about proofreading before sending out an official letter signed by the President of the United States?!

Chai, O Boy! # BackToSender Can such ever happen in Nigeria? "Teacher Receives Letter From White House, Corrects It Before Sending It Back." The Letter is from the President of the United States # POTUS,...https://mashable.com/2018/05/28/teacher-white-house-letter/ …

And THIS is the president of the United States?! Veteran teacher Yvonne Mason said she's mailed the letter -- covered with her suggested corrections -- back to the White House. https://www.huffingtonpost.com/entry/retired-teacher-trump-letter-yvonne-mason_us_5b0a829ee4b0568a880c39b7?ncid=engmodushpmg00000004 … via @ HuffPost

Teacher corrects White House letter with 'many silly mistakes,' sends it back to Trump https://www.yahoo.com/news/m/5cda1878-ae12-3323-ba30-155d2329755e/teacher-corrects-white-house.html?.tsrc=fauxdal … Correcting school papers is not the same as being the President of the United States. She managed to get her ugly face on the web, now she can go away!

It does not speak well for the teacher who had. A President of the United States would dictate a letter, he would not type nor write it himself. The teacher ought to have been thankful the White House answered, thus what she did is just appalling.

John Adams, second President of the United States (1787-1801), in a letter to his wife Abigail, 2 November 1800, on moving into the White House: "May none but honest and wise men ever rule under this roof." pic.twitter.com/keK9C8x0AM
